mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sr.NAME FROM sys_role sr, sys_user_role ur, sys_user su WHERE sr.ID = ur.ROLE_ID AND ur.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT sm.URL FROM sys_user su, sys_user_role ur, sys_role sr, sys_role_menu rm, sys_menu sm WHERE su.ID = ur.USER_ID AND ur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID AND sr.ID = rm.ROLE_ID AND rm.MENU_ID = sm.ID AND sm.URL IS NOT NULL AND sm.URL != '' AND ur.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT sm.ID, sm.ICON, sm.URL, sm.NAME, sm.ORDER_NO, sm.TYPE, sm.PARENT_ID FROM sys_user su, sys_user_role ur, sys_role sr, sys_role_menu rm, sys_menu sm WHERE su.ID = ur.USER_ID AND ur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID AND sr.ID = rm.ROLE_ID AND rm.MENU_ID = sm.ID AND sm.URL IS NOT NULL AND ur.USER_ID = #{userId}
